member.name: M:Liminal.SDK.VR.Devices.Emulator.EmulatorDevice.HasCapabilities(Liminal.SDK.VR.VRDeviceCapability)
member.summary: Indicates if the device has a specific set of capabilities using a bitmask of values.
member.param: A bitmask of capabilities to check.
member.returns: A boolean indicating if the device has all of the specified capabilities.
